SELECT sou.id, sou.user_id, sou.organization_id, sou.department_id, su.name userName, sou.`enable`, su.gender, su.phone, su.email, sou.supervisor_id, sou.employee_id, sou.position, sou.employee_type, sou.work_city, sou.create_time, sou.update_time, sou.create_user, sou.update_user FROM sys_organization_user sou INNER JOIN sys_user su ON sou.user_id = su.id where sou.department_id = #{request.departmentId}
and ( su.name like concat('%', #{request.keyword},'%') or su.phone like concat('%', #{request.keyword},'%') )
